short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Allows you to extract data from a shared Folk database to Excel (XLSX) or CSV.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Updated: October 2024

Honest disclosure: I haven't figured out how to get this to work every single time. If you find it's not working for you, please email me!

Features:
• Export to Microsoft Excel (XLSX), CSV
• Copy to Clipboard

How it works:
• Just right-click to download in your desired format
• You get 5 free exports, afterwards you can purchase a 10-pack of exports

♥,
George
